channel.title: How do I add drops in PvP?
channel.description: Hey, in my server, when someone dies from pking or bosses they keep all their items... How can I make it to where if they are skulled it will drop all, if not it will save the 3 most valuable items? Any help or links to a C&P thread would be appreciated as i am in a hurry..

item.description:

Read full topic
